document.full_text: in the central bank governor's wood-paneled office with its beige couch and chairs around a queen anne coffee table, the man reached into his briefcase and pulled out an envelope full of cash, offering it expectantly to then-governor ljubisa krgovic.
document.title: special report: in the wild west balkans, a banker's tale
lines_and_colors: in the central bank governor's wood-paneled office with its beige couch and chairs around a queen anne coffee table, the man reached into his briefcase and pulled out an envelope full of cash, offering it expectantly to then-governor ljubisa krgovic.
